treatment-md.title: Pholeuonopsis (Pholeuonopsis) sljivovicensis Ćurčić, Vrbica, Vesović, Antić, Petković, Bosco & Ćurčić, 2015, sp. n.
treatment-md.article-title: A new troglobitic species of the genus Pholeuonopsis (Coleoptera: Leiodidae: Cholevinae: Leptodirini) from western Serbia, with a key to the species from Serbia
